alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Far Northeast Highlands; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Guadalupe County; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; South Central Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued November 18 at 4:36PM MST until November 19 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in freezing fog. * WHERE...Sandia and Manzano Mountains including Edgewood, Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass, East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains, South Central Highlands, Far Northeast Highlands, and Guadalupe County. This mainly includes the eastern slopes of the Sangre de Cristo Mountains to the Interstate 25 corridor as well as the eastern slopes of the Sandia and Manzano Mountains. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. Black ice conditions will also be possible in these areas.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Far Northeast Highlands; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Guadalupe County; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; South Central Highlands
